original_text: I had told Titus that I was very proud of you. When he came to you, you showed that I was right about you. We have always spoken only true things to you. And when we said good things about you to Titus, you showed that those things were also true.
korean_text: 내가 그에게 너희를 위하여 자랑한 것이 있더라도 부끄럽지 아니하니 우리가 너희에게 이른 말이 다 참된 것 같이 디도 앞에서 우리가 자랑한 것도 참되게 되었도다

sentences.original_text: that I was very proud of you
you showed that I was right about you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내가 너희에 대해 옳았음을 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: We have always spoken only true things
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 항상 오직 참된 것만 말했다

sentences.original_text: And when we said good things about you to Titus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리가 디도에게 너희에 대해 좋은 것들을 말했을 때

sentences.original_text: you showed that those things were also true
